item.title: Level 3 Shows How The Converged Business Network Saves Money
item.description:
Larger organizations have been moving towards network convergence since IP became the standard network protocol. However, smaller companies, often lacking substantial IT departments, haven’t adopted this approach as readily. This is changing. Convergence is now a viable option for businesses of all sizes. What’s driving this shift? The answer, as always, is cost savings. In today’s business climate, reducing expenses is crucial. The real game-changer is the availability of managed convergence services...
